channel.title: Blood on the Forums: Clown Fiesta (2/9 Students Remain) END-GAME (SOCIETY WINS)
channel.description:
Your heart is racing, you're scared, confused and cold. Oh so very cold. You don't know what happened, all you know is that you were just living your ordinary(ish) life as one of the former Ultimates of the League of Nations. Your life was so good, so easy, so pure. Until it wasn't of course. Suddenly youre in some sort of fortress? A research facility? You don't know. All you want to do is go back home.
Suddenly you hear a booming cackle come out from within the walls in front of you, suddenly the walls fall down and you see an ugly old woman, covered in warts and boils. Golden locks cascade down the left side of her pale, aged face. But her right side's frostbitten flesh is sloughing off before your very eyes. This may be the ugliest woman you've ever seen.
**"Hello class of [REDACTED]! It's time for your high school reunion! It's been so long I think we should have a quick little icebreaker, and I have a game i'm just DYING to play with you! MUAHAHAHAHHAHAHA"**
**"Me and assistant principal Mr MoroKoroner are very excited to welcome you all to a deadly reunion of killing! Now I understand that it may be a long time for some of you. But Mr MonoKoroner will be happy to show you the ropes!"**
Suddenly a small man in a lab coat appears, his face is covered with rags, but he's still wearing glasses, proper Victorian gentleman's spectacles of course.
He says **"One of you 9 is keeping you all as a prisoner. They have made a pact with forces from the Abyss for ultimate power. If they win they achieve their goal and you all spend eternity in the Abyss forever. If you win they and anyone plotting with them shall be cursed to wander as a spectre forever.**"
"**However, if you had no help at all, the game would be boring. And us demons feast on conflict of course. So even though we would love it if we could just nibble at those juicy little souls, we have decided to help you out. We have given you the skills of heroes located in the *Codex Malificarium*. I trust you will study well.**"
**"Oh, and before I finish, Zoey here gave me such a pleasant latte earlier I decided to show some mercy on her. You never realize how much you appreciate the little things as a demon.**"
# Zoey Smithers (@Marshal) is the Barista!
# Barista: Each night, until dusk, 1) A player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) Their ability works twice. They learn which.
# Pre-Game has begun. You may not speak.
[details="Character List"] https://imgur.com/a/UhrU1pj [/details]
1 - Gorta 2 - Cantaloupe 3 - ~~Intensify~~ Executed day 2 (ghost vote still active) 4 - PokemonKidRyan 5 - ~~Leafia~~ Executed day 1 (ghost vote not active) 6 - ~~Windward~~ Died night 2 (ghost vote still active) 7 - ~~Marshal ([color=Purple]Barista[/color])~~ Travelled away day 1 8 - ~~Marl~~ Died day 1 (Ghost vote not active) 9 - ~~Amelia~~ Died night 1 (ghost vote still active)
Spectators -
Katze - Informed
Backups - Whysper CRichard
[D1 - Viktor Levin (Marluxion) dies after nominating!](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/blood-on-the-forums-clown-fiesta-9-9-students-remain-chapter-1-voting-phase/86780/680?u=gghana) [D1 - Zoey Smithers (Marshal) travels away!](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/blood-on-the-forums-clown-fiesta-9-9-students-remain-chapter-1-voting-phase/86780/1073?u=gghana) [D1 - Miguel Lorenzez (Leafia) is executed and dies!](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/blood-on-the-forums-clown-fiesta-5-9-students-remain-chapter-2-discussion-phase/86780/1759?u=gghana) [D2 - Susan Brown (Amelia) dies at night!](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/blood-on-the-forums-clown-fiesta-5-9-students-remain-chapter-2-discussion-phase/86780/1766?u=gghana) [D2 - Anne Saxe-Coburg (Intensify) is executed and dies!](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/blood-on-the-forums-clown-fiesta-5-9-students-remain-chapter-2-discussion-phase/86780/2781?u=gghana) [D3 - Clyde Beauregard (Windward) dies at night!](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/blood-on-the-forums-clown-fiesta-5-9-students-remain-chapter-2-discussion-phase/86780/2782?u=gghana)

item.title: Blood on the Forums: Clown Fiesta (2/9 Students Remain) END-GAME (SOCIETY WINS)
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Arete:

short guide to doing reaction tests

  • reactiontests should have a point
  • you should expect there to actually be differences in reactions and that you will be able to distinguish what the reactions mean
  • reactiontests shouldn’t be obvious reactiontests
  • reactiontests shouldn’t derail the thread for hours, or make you look like an outed confirmed wolf (second point is ok to violate if you’re hardconfirmable)

i feel like you’re trying to subtly subtweet the reaction test that solved the game

Read full topic
